trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_000<tab>You are come to Camp Tranquil. Is there aught you wish to know?
TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_010<tab>As a Wood Wailer, I have charge over the security of the camp and the surrounding area.
TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_011<tab>Ever since the Calamity, we have taken on the added responsibility of maintaining the hanging bridges that span the breadth of Rootslake.

TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_012<tab>It may seem like drudgery, but I would sooner replace a few planks than haul out every single overladen carriage that becomes stuck in one of the muddy pools below.

TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_020<tab>This camp is an important waypoint along the lifeline of trade between Gridania and Ul'dah. Follow the southern bridge, and you will find yourself in the barrens of Thanalan.

TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_021<tab>Rootslake below used to be an honest-to-gods lake, but the Calamity drained away most of the water. We were left with a sultry mire teeming with wildlife never before seen in the Twelveswood.

TEXT_REGFSTCAMPTRANQUIL_00127_FARRIMOND_000_022<tab>Oh, and do have a care when crossing the hanging bridges. Incidents are on the rise wherein travelers are taken by an inexplicable jumping fit and suffer a bad fall. And they oft regret stumbling into what they find upon landing...
